confirmed_insights.insight: HMM-only entry (bandit mode) outperforms neural network predictions
confirmed_insights.evidence: Bandit: 40.9% win rate, +$1.40/trade vs Consensus: 37.7% win rate, -$2.33/trade
implications: Keep bandit as default entry controller

confirmed_insights.insight: Win rate is NOT the bottleneck - per-trade P&L is
implications: Focus on exit strategy, not entry selection
Average loss > average win is the real problem

confirmed_insights.insight: Exit ratio asymmetry (-8%/+12%) requires 40% win rate to break even
confirmed_insights.evidence: Mathematical: 8/(8+12) = 40% breakeven. With transaction costs, need >42%
implications: Consider wider exits to let winners run

confirmed_insights.evidence: Predictions expire at 15min but positions held 45min. Drift causes reversals.
implications: Reduce max hold to 15-20 min OR extend prediction horizon

confirmed_insights.insight: 5K cycle tests can be misleading - period sensitivity is high
confirmed_insights.evidence: HMM+Neural: +715% in 5K, -93.5% in 20K (same config, different periods)
implications: Always validate promising results with 20K cycles

confirmed_insights.insight: Dynamic exit evaluator hurts performance significantly
confirmed_insights.evidence: Win rate dropped from 40.4% to 0.8% with theta decay checks
implications: Options need time to develop, don't cut early

confirmed_insights.insight: Pre-trained model on 3 months data, tested on current month performs best
confirmed_insights.evidence: User-reported: Walk-forward validation with 3-month training window

failed_approaches.reason: Theta decay check triggers too aggressively, cutting positions too early for short-term options
Waits for too many confirmations, enters late after trend established, catches reversals
failed_approaches.note: Could work with different signal weighting

failed_approaches.reason: Highest win rate (41.3%) but worst P&L (-$2.81/trade). Fading consensus catches fake reversals.
Great in favorable periods (+715% 5K), terrible in extended tests (-93.5% 20K). Period-sensitive.
failed_approaches.note: Might work with better neural model

best_configuration.name: Dec 2025 Pretrained (CURRENT BEST)
best_configuration.notes: Pretrained model on 3 months data, tested on Dec 2025
best_configuration.needs_investigation: Find exact config that produced this result

hardware.note: Can run 4 experiments in parallel for faster iteration
